name: Another Office Day
description:
This is a game about a guy who tried to escape from the monotony of office work. But... It turned into an entity called Chartum. And now... This entity is chasing the guy. You have to be extra careful after 90 seconds of playing...

Control:

Jump - Space

Somersault - "S" (Space to end the somersault)

To throw the laptop, select the distance with the mouse cursor and press "E" to throw.

Developers: Comp_Master, LHI, Nikishon, rop

Tags:

Horror, Adventure, Runner, Survival, Platformer
